Sentencas: The main barrier to symmetrical solid oxide cells (SSOCs), where the same catalytic materials are used simultaneously as the anodes and the cathodes, is to find a redox-stable catalyst that exhibits superior catalytic activities for both fuel oxidation/reduction and oxygen reduction/evolution reactions.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Here, we report a simple strategy by Sc doping La0.6Ca0.4Fe0.8Ni0.2O3-delta (LCFN) with enhanced electrocatalytic activity and stability in SSOCs.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: La0.6Ca0.4Fe0.7Sc0.1Ni0.2O3-delta (LCFSN) oxide has better crystal structural stability, lower coefficient of thermal expansion (TEC) and good conductivity.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In addition, LCFSN has lower polarization resistance both in air, CO2 or H-2 compared with LCFN.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the SSOCs with LCFSN showed the maximum power densities of 0.332 and 0.234 W cm(-2) when operating in humidified hydrogen at 850 degrees C and 800 degrees C, respectively, and the cell shows maximum current densities of 1.093 A cm(-2) for CO2 electrolysis at 850 degrees C and 1.8 V.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In addition, the cell also has good stability toward both fuel cell and electrolysis cell.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Therefore, this work suggests that B site Sc doping is a promising approach to the redox-stable catalyst for SSOCs.
Titulo: A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells
A Simple Sc Doping Strategy to Enhance Electrocatalytic Activity and Stability in Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells
